    • Method Detail

      • getAppKey

        private void getAppKey()
        Try and obtain the app key from Assets folder in order to use Open Mapquest APIs. If file cannot be open, or the app key cannot be read, an AlerDialog will force the user to close the application.

      • setOriginCurrent

        public void setOriginCurrent(View view)
        When the location button is pressed, the text of button changes to show the user that we'll be using their current location. Finally, createClosestStationsIntent() is called.
        Parameters:
        view -

      • setOriginText

        public void setOriginText(View view)
        When the text field is pressed, a ManualLocationText object is created. All processes dealing with the inputted text is handled there.
        Parameters:
        view -

      • onRadioButtonClicked

        public void onRadioButtonClicked(View view)
        Based on what radio button is selected the option will either set whether to use distance or duration to sort location, or will set what mode of transportation the user is going to use. After this, based on other circumstances, either the text field or current location button will activate.
        Parameters:
        view -

      • getAllStationsAndEntrances

        private void getAllStationsAndEntrances()
        All stations in the database are stored, and for each of those stations their list of entrances are also saved.
